body.name: Ingenuity Dream Hero 3-in-1 Co-Sleeping Bassinet and Crib - Constellation (Grey), Unisex, Newborn to 12 Months
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 20 hrs 34 mins
features: Get 3 modes in one with the Ingenuity Dream Hero; 3 modes of use: bedside sleeper, bassinet and crib; securely attach to your bedside with safety straps in bedside sleeper mode
4 height adjustments accommodate the height of your bed for safe bedside sleeping and easier access to your baby; lower the mattress as baby grows to extend use up to 12 months in crib mode
Soothing unit includes music, white noise and a soft light to check on baby; breathable mesh provides airflow and visibility so you and baby can sleep easy
Easy to move from room to room for naptimes or when baby graduates to the nursery; locking wheels ensure secure and stable placement; mattress is designed with the right firmness for baby

Includes 1 machine washable sheet; quilted fabric details on the frame provide luxurious comfort with modern gray fabric to fit your home aesthetic; dimensions: 27.8" (H) x 29.9" (W) x 27.2" (D)​; ages 0-12 months or up to 25 lbs
body.description: You and baby can both sleep easy with a safe and comfortable environment that lasts through their entire first year. The Ingenuity Dream Hero 3-in-1 Co-Sleeping Bassinet keeps baby right by your side for more peaceful nights. With 3 modes of use, you can easily convert this baby bed from bedside sleeper to bassinet to crib as your little one grows. Use the 4 height adjustments to accommodate the height of your bed, making it easier to reach and respond to your baby through the night. The breathable mesh sides allow more airflow and visibility. Whether keeping baby in your room or moving them to the nursery, you can lower the mattress to extend the use of your bassinet up to 12 months. Music and white noise help soothe your baby. Includes a soft night light to check on baby. This smart design is versatile enough for your baby’s use for up to a year. Move the Dream Hero from room to room with wheels that lock securely in place. Mattress is designed with the right firmness for baby & mattress pad is washable. Includes 1 machine washable sheet. Dimensions: 27.8" (H) x 29.9" (W) x 27.2" (D)

productInformation.name: Product Care Instructions
productInformation.value: Bassinet Sheet: Machine wash in cold water. Air dry flat., Bassinet: Spot clean with a soft, clean cloth and mild soap., Mattress: Remove structural boards. Fasten all hook-and-loop tabs. Machine wash in cold water. Air dry flat. See more

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Features You’ll Love Transitions to 3 modes: bedside sleeper, bassinet, and crib Lower the mattress as baby grows to extend use up to 12 months Features music, soothing sounds, and a soft light to check on baby Offers 4 height adjustments to fit your bed's height Dream Hero 3-in-1 Co-Sleeping Bassinet Constellation You and baby can both sleep easy with a safe and comfortable environment that lasts through their entire first year. The Ingenuity Dream Hero 3-in-1 Co-Sleeping Bassinet keeps baby right by your side for more peaceful nights. With 3 modes of use, you can easily convert this baby bed from bedside sleeper to bassinet to crib as your little one grows.

Serene sleeping solutions for baby is merely a dream away Mode 1: Bedside Sleeper In the co-sleeper mode for newborn to 5 months, secure safety straps to your bedside with the bedside sleeper window open to encourage bonding and closeness while keeping baby safe in their own sleep space. Mode 2: Bassinet The comfy bassinet is crafted with your newborn to 5 month-old baby in mind. Music and white noise are at the ready to help soothe your baby. Mode 3: Crib Children grow up so fast, but that doesn't mean the Dream Hero's job is done. Lower the mattress in crib mode to extend the use of your bassinet up to 12 months. The easy-to-clean mattress is designed with the right firmness for baby.

A hero that champions baby's safety, comfort, and peaceful Zzzs Sound sleep starts with safety Dream Hero's locking wheels ensure stable placement. The feet move backward to secure to bed for ​co-sleeping​. Attach the straps under your mattress to help eliminate gaps and keep the bedside sleeper secure to your bed. Reaching new heights The 4 easy-to-use height adjustments accommodate the height of your bed, making it easier to reach and respond to your baby through the night. Lull baby to sleep with soothing lights and melodies Calming melodies and white noise help soothe your baby. Dream Hero also includes a soft night light to help you keep a close eye on baby.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Update: 3 months in baby sleeps in it just fine! Not a super huge fan of the music but that’s okay I have a Hatch sound system anyways but the night light comes in handy! This is my first baby I haven’t co slept but I love that I can still have her next to me just not in my bed lol. It’s holding up well despite my 2 year old thinking she can sleepy in it. 10/10 still recommend. 👍I’m getting induced tommorow so I’ll update my review after I have the baby HOWEVER, this was super easy to put together 8 months and very pregnant. There’s good space, I love how it’ll grow with baby. It’s def a little bulkier than a normal bassinet but it’s not too big. Still smaller than a regular size crib. Feels sturdy and good material. Rolling around is easy even on carpet! I’m very excited for this item. :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Me gusta pero quisiera saber si venden el colchón más grueso o cuales son las medida para comprar uno independiente para que la bebe esté más cómoda porque el que tiene es muy tiezo

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the Money
reviews.reviewText: I am so glad I got this bassinet. I keep it at my bedside with the side down so I can see and access him easily. I love it and so does my baby.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We got this to keep at my parents' house. We already have a bassinet at home but were tired of having to unassemble it and bring the bassinet with us when we went to visit. This was easy to set up and we like that it has rollers in case we need to switch rooms for some reason or my parents can roll it into the closet when someone else stays. None of my kids have been fans of the music parts of any bassinets we have had so I don't forsee that being used.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is the ultimate best bassinet. Soo many different options from a bassinet next to your bed to a stand alone bassinet to a crib. It was easy to build with a lovely soothing music. The fabric is nicely quilted and the baby will be able to use this bassinet/crib a year. Highly recommend this bassinet

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars An Excellent Product
reviews.reviewText: This is a great product to use especially if you are looking for something for a young child. Every new parent is concerned with how to keep your child close to you at night without having to take up too much space in your room, or risk having the child sleep in bed with you. This device grows with your child and lets you have multiple options to meet the sleep style that is the most beneficial for you. As a father of three, this is a great product and one that I wish I had with all of my children. Whether you are a first time parent or have been a parent for a while, this is an excellent option for giving your kids a rest. The build quality of it is strong and you do not have to worry about it putting your child in danger. Overall, I recommend this product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I don’t like how the wheels stick out, I trip over them and accidentally lock the breaks ALL. THE. TIME. The height adjustment system is very clunky, not user friendly, and the sides don’t go up and down simultaneously easily. It’s hard to tell where each level is and when you let go of the handles, it clunks down, hard to the lower level if you don’t have it high enough for the upper level. I don’t like the fitted sheet because it stains very easily. Also the Velcro straps make it very difficult to find other fitted sheets to fit it without having to put eyelets in to accommodate the Velcro, or just leave the Velcro undone. I like the side that zips down, would like it on both sides. I do not like how it’s hard to undo the side so I just leave it down all the time at this point since my child can’t roll over or move freely yet. I like how big the mention is to have baby stay in it for longer, instead of having to switch to a crib.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is such a nice bassinet!
reviews.reviewText: We love everything about it. The adjustable height is a plus, the wide open side to be able to check the baby without getting up, the wheels, the sound machine and the lights, the sturdiness and the fact that it’s SO easy to assemble!It’s a little bulkier than I expected but that is what makes it so sturdy.
Muy buenos materiales y el.detalle de las ruedas que se ajustan al.espacio a mi me.fue muy útil.
